reviews.review:
Makes me wanna rethink my life choices 

10/10

Don't buy this game. This game is unbalanced and as killer you cannot win at high mmr without sweating due to there always being a 4 man SWF. I've quit this game because it isn't fun losing non stop. There also aren't enough killer because they all quit the game. This game is not some hide and seek game or how to developers call it: "multiplayer (4vs1) horror game where one player takes on the role of the savage Killer, and the other four players play as Survivors." This game is more like a horror game for the killers. Nothing is special about this game. 
I'not salty, just look around this review, there are ALOT of other negative reviews that explain the game better than me, they also have 1000+ hours on the game. BHVR messed this game up bad and I'm not getting it back.
Just get VHS or PropNight. Games that are actually balanced.
Gutes Spiel. Es könnte besser gebalanced sein aber es geht

NEW WAITING SIMULATOR 2021 VERSION 4.5.2.   
How I can Start? The devs only think about money and releasing chapters. They make this community think "our opinion" matters. But we all know its a bunch of crap. These guys do whatever they want and add stuff nobody asks for. There is huge and inmense problem with the matchmaking, horrible queue times, and only to get a camping killer, and if you disconnect is your fault? How ironic! Besides that, the hitboxes are so horrible and these guys never care to fix this problem, but hey they've done a pretty good job so far. This game and concept are great, but unfortanetely is in the wrong hands. Its an unbalanced game and it takes all the fun of it, people are to toxic, and i've encounter youtbers like "the king" that camping is a great strategy once you get gen rushed. That's so lame. I mean defend your honor and play the game, but well. Thngs will never change if the devs don't care. After all I can't recommend this game, but I still play it to get a bit better and mpre tolerant to toxic and camper people.

I don't, its such a unbalanced mess and you could and should buy a different game. IK it only says 3.9 hours but ive been playing on my ps4 for about 3 years and i can't stress this enough. BUY. A. DIFFERENT. GAME. IDC if your friends have a collective 3 brain cells, dont buy this game. Its not worth it. Thank you for coming to my ted talk
(review time, its alright. Ive finally learned to calm down and not mald at every second. it can be pretty fun with friends or by urself. so if its on sale, buy it. If not then id wait or ask someone to buy you it, thank you for coming to my review)
By far one of my favorite games. It's challenging and sometimes frustrating but it's always a unique experience no matter how many times i've played.

A year ago I would have recommended this game, but not anymore... There are too many campy killers, the queue time still sucks and after the new HUD update, the killers have extra range. And yes.... There are perks to help you, but there is only so much you can do against a campy killer... The concept of the game is pretty good, but Behaviour doesn't seem to care about a balanced gameplay! DON'T waste your money on this sh*tty game! It's not worth your time or money (maybe if you can get it for under 5 euro...)

Отсутствует тех.поддержка, многое на английском, я не хочу ломать голову и переводить, делаете и продаёте в русскоязычных странах - русский язык в студию для обновлений, поддержки и прочего, за игру деньги платятся. Читы в игре за 5 лет никуда не исчезли. Кто наглее заметен, кто по-умнее и хитрее пользуется тихонько - скорость подкрутит и прочее, тех.поддержки по читам нет. Никто Вам не ответит заблокирован такой-то по Вашей жалобе или нет. Обман с каплями ранга, неправильно начисляют при завершении игры, при загрузке за выживших игрок отключился - минус капля всей команде и вы на это никак повлиять не можете. Хиты в окна, через паллеты, не всегда скидываются доски. Нечестные выжившие и маны. Сняли сурва - ман его тут же ложит и так пару раз. Ману от этого очки не снимают. Сурвы, с читами  и дискордом тоже порядком обсирают игру.

After playing this game for a couple of years and 1400+ hours I thought to myself it's a good time for a review.

Let's maybe start with good things about this game:

- It has a lot of killers and survivors from very well known movies and franchises 
- It is quite fun to play with a group of friends
- You can sink a lot of hours into it without it feeling repetitive due to a lot of maps, killers and perks
- The game gets updates and is being supported long after release
- As a killer it really feels rewarding and fun to murder some people
- I found GF because of it LMAO

But what about the bad things? Well:

- The game is buggy as hell, devs have botched mechanics, maps, killers, optimization
- The community is toxic as hell, divided between entitled survivor mains, entitled killer mains, trolls, cheaters and people who do not give a damn
- With every patch this game runs worse, after a couple of years you need to have far better PC specs than you used to have, optimization is pure garbage
- Reworks of maps, balance changes, new perks and killers feel unbalanced in both overpowered and severely underpowered ways, it really feels like devs do not play this game (which they don't really)
- Devs spend most of their time and effort on making cosmetic items, useless charms and thinking of new ways for monetization (soon to be EA level) and to be fair, with no cosmetic shop all those years ago, game was better
- Both sides (surv and killers) being assholes to each other on every step, I stopped playing surv solo since atmosphere is so toxic, especially on red ranks
- Crossplay is so unbalanced, it's laughable, but if you disable it, you will wait couple of hours for a game
- Rifts have poorly designed challenges for both the killers and survivors
- To be fair, if not for a fact that my GF still wants to play this game, I would stop long time ago

All in all I could write about more bad things but there is no point, these are the most harmful. 

To sum it up, I can not recommend this game for sane people. If you would like to be a part of this toxic community, then be my guest. If not, then stay the hell away.
垃圾游戏，匹配机制超差，。网费杀手

这游戏实属脑瘫，每次四排，某个B总是掉掉掉，使劲掉线，排半个小时排到人了，他掉线了，他当房主，排半个小时排到人了，房主主机连接失败，排半个小时排到人了，只有他自己进去了，每天都这样，他妈的这是唯一一个让老子还没进游戏就血压拉满的游戏，是不是，汁汁？

Es un juego muy entretenido lo recomiendo, pero los editores no están por lo que tienen que estar con un juego de este nivel de demanda, hay muchos lagazos, ayer salte de un espacio a estar en otro lugar, alguna vez te echa y dice error tuyo que se te corto Internet y eso no es asi pero bueno, debieran arreglar esos errores o al menos no sancionar de la forma que sancionan, tiempo de espera en minutos sin jugar y pierdes todos los accesorios y ofrendas puesta y que cuestan muchos puntos, centrarse en sacar nuevos killers que valgan la pena killers con peso como el payaso de IT, CHUKYetc...
me encanta de veras y recomiendo pero tiene grandes lagunas este juego aun, sobre todo si juegas como KILLER ex ponte a que te llamen de todo excepto BUEN JUGADOR de no ser que dejes escapar a todos.
暂时除了延迟没有其他比较严重影响游戏体验的问题，唯一让我拉满血压的就是一直在蹲蘑菇的小日本了
Moim zdaniem ta gra jest bardzo fajna, posiada dużo śmiesznych bugów, które raczej nie przeszkadzają w grze, chyba że zbugowane hitboxy, ale pozatym, gra mi się bardzo podoba

1. Buy the Leatherface DLC
2. Acquire the perk: Insidious
3. Down a survivor near the basement on any map
4. Hook the downed survivor in the basement
5. Stand still in or around the basement out of sight
6. ???
7. Rank 1
DBD Is An Amazing game, 100% Recommend To Play. Awesome Community And So Many New Friends To Make. Please Consider And Come Join... See You In The Fog!
